entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then becoming west 70 gusting to 90. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
